AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Indecisive Youth
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Like most young high elves [PAWN_nameDef]had a 'I wanna be a Farstrider' phase, which [PAWN_pronoun] had left by the time [PAWN_pronoun] was taken as an apprentice. Then it was the 'I'm going to be a magister' stage.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cheater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]played a game called Captive with other high elf children, wherein each turn a child would be tied up by the others. The one who would release themselves in the least amount of time won. Somehow [PAWN_nameDef]always managed to get out the quickest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pampered Brat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]was born into a particularly rich family and got everything [PAWN_pronoun] asked for. It was a huge shock when the Scourge destroyed everything [PAWN_pronoun] knew. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn very quickly how to fend for [PAWN_pronoun]self.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kaldorei Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: All high elves were originally night elves until they split over the use of magic. [PAWN_nameDef]wasn't especially interested in the arcane and only travelled to the Eastern Kingdoms because [PAWN_possessive] family made [PAWN_pronoun].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Early Adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During the trek across the Eastern Kingdoms the Quel'dorei passed through and stopped in many different lands. [PAWN_nameDef]often sneaked out to explore while the adults weren't looking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Highborne Exile
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]was one of the many Kaldorei Highborne to be exiled from night elf lands. Following the ideals of Dath'Remar Sunstrider [PAWN_nameDef]joined the other exiles in a voyage across the seas to find new land for themselves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Expedition Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The journey from Ashenvale to what is now known as Quel'thalas was a long and treacherous one. Many Highborne perished in this mission, but [PAWN_nameDef]was able to tend to many who would have died without [PAWN_possessive] aid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Self-Exile
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]came to doubt the future of [PAWN_possessive] once proud race. [PAWN_pronoun] placed [PAWN_pronoun]self under a self-imposed exile out of shame for the damage [PAWN_pronoun] wrought upon the world through [PAWN_possessive] abuse of arcane magic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shipwright
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In order to search for unoccupied land for the Highborne to call home many adopted the task of building ships to cross the seas. [PAWN_nameDef]was one of those elves. [PAWN_possessive] skills would be called upon again to build destroyer ships to aid in the Second War.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]stays aloof and distant from [PAWN_possessive] Alliance allies. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps to [PAWN_pronoun]self and enjoys wandering through forests alone or in small groups of close friends.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonhawk Handler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]participated in the Third War from the back of a mighty dragonhawk. Once the war was over [PAWN_pronoun] took to handling and training further dragonhawks as aerial mounts. [PAWN_nameDef]secretly preferred hippogryphs and nowadays enjoys training them for the Silver Covenant.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Light Worshipper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Many high elves once revered the Holy Light, but rejected it in favour of arcane magic. Some still look to the Light today with [PAWN_nameDef]being one of few who dedicates themselves to it entirely.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Archivist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]believes it is important to keep records of [PAWN_possessive] race's history regardless of their faults and dedicates [PAWN_possessive] time collecting and documenting important documents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arcane Rune-Scribe
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as magically proficient as other elves, [PAWN_nameDef]knows how to better harness arcane energy and aids the Silver Covenant in honing their spells through use of intricate runes and glyphs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Master Jewelcrafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]has a keen eye and a steady hand. With these, [PAWN_pronoun] cuts and refines gems and crystals to be used in enchanting or to be crafted into fine jewellery.
